tool_description: Fast and Simple JoJ Image Search API. You can get 100+ search results in one query!
name: JoJ Image Search
title: JoJ Image Search

api_list.name: Search
Search V2 (recommended)

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description:
Search query. You can use search parameters.

e.g. `adele site:youtube.com`
e.g. `query -exclude`

optional_parameters.name: safe
optional_parameters.description: If you want safe search, set it to `active`

optional_parameters.name: suggestion_query
optional_parameters.description: Suggestion query (must be taken from response suggestions).

optional_parameters.name: hl
optional_parameters.description: Language code for search. Default: en
